availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Rosaline Montgomery. Father of Anna Montgomery. Farmer in Adair County in 1870.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, White Oak, p. 11. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, White Oak, p. 46. Find A Grave, “Joel Robert Montgomery (February 19, 1833-March 21, 1907)” Memorial #59288295, http://findagrave.com/memorial/59288295 (accessed on February 10, 2018).
